sections.text: and desist orders; violations.Any insurer, health insurance lead generator, or person violating a cease and desist order of the director under section 44-1529 may after notice and hearing and upon order of the director be subject to:(1) A monetary penalty of not more than thirty thousand dollars for each violation, not to exceed an aggregate penalty of one hundred fifty thousand dollars; and(2) Suspension or revocation of the insurer's license or certificate of authority.SourceLaws 1973, LB 349, ยง 11;Laws 1991, LB 234, ยง 14;Laws 2025, LB326, ยง 8.Effective Date: September 3, 2025
